description: Writer/Director James Byrkit, Producer Lene Bausager, Executive Producer Alyssa Byrkit, Co-writer/Actor Alex Manugian, and Actors Emily Foxler, Hugo Armstrong, and Maury Sterling LIVE in attendance!
synopsis: On the night a comet is passing near Earth, a dinner party takes an odd turn. When the power goes out, eight friends discover that the only house on the street left with power also holds many secrets.
title: Coherence
